game.name: SHATTERFARMS
game.shortDescription: Farm. Forage. Fight. SHATTERFARMS is a first-person farmcore roguelike where you'll scavenge and fight through the Calamity, while cultivating a mysterious farm to survive and grow stronger. Creatures are untamed, magic unstable, and horrors unimaginable. Welcome to SHATTERFARMS.
